data.name: Call of Senpai: Waifu Warfare 2
data.detailed_description:
About that. You are buying a complete set with the game, which you can pass from start to finish. All future updates will be free.

"INCLUDES A SURVIVAL MODE IN THE BASE SET OF THE GAME"


Survival Mode Lost in the Jungle and separated from the group, Fumiko is attacked by local natives. Hold out as long as possible, buy weapons, ammo and first-aid kits and hold off the waves of natives!

Story Mode



Mariya, a girl with Ukrainian roots. When you look at her, you might say that she is a real party girl and enjoys life without problems, but that is not the case at all...... After numerous complaints and being expelled from school for hooliganism, her father takes her back to her homeland in Japan to live with her brother. And it would seem all is well, another country, another school, but once she learns that her brother's girlfriend wins the tournament "Call Of Senpai" with a prize of 5 million dollars, but that would get there need to gain the required number of points from the curators, who have their "cockroaches" in his head, which falls on Mariya.

- Funny characters with great humor.
- Complete a variety of interesting missions to progress through the story.
- Explore the open world, which has become 5 times larger, you have access to the beach, mountains, hotels and a couple of cities, everywhere there are various additional activities.
- Improved customization of your character is available to you, bored with your hairstyle? Go to a hairdresser. Tired of your costume? Run to the nearest clothing store and change your clothes!

data.short_description: Take control of Maria, a girl with Ukrainian roots. Explore the open world and complete quests from your friends and handlers to earn points and qualify for the $5 million Call of Senpai tournament.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 8100 / Amd Ryzen 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 950 / Amd Radeon R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel core i5 10400f / Amd Ryzen 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 6Gb / Amd Radeon RX 580 8Gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains animated violence, profanity, sex scenes, and covered nudity.
